short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gympass, the ultimate chrome extension that keeps you on track and energized!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay active with the "Gympass" Chrome extension! With Gympass, you'll receive friendly reminders to take short breaks and engage in exercise every hour. Let Gympass be your wellness companion while you work. Stay healthy, stay productive!
